text:
In WebTesting, when you remove Cookie Manager (by right-clicking on Cookie 
Manger and selecting Remove), the Cookie Manager control panel is still visible 
and it even allows you to enter cookie values.  

Once you click on another element (for example, WebTesting), the Cookie Manager 
control panel is replaced with another control panel and there's no way to get 
back to the Cookie Manager control panel.  Not a big bug, but kinda weird.
creator: khammond25@home.com
bruce@ebrary.com
text:
This seems to be fixed in the latest CVS checkout & build.
(Not sure when it was fixed.)

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
